name: open-diabetes-filter
description: Allows programming OpenDiabetesFilters using Google Blockly

cli.title: Open Diabetes Vault Command Line Interface

executable.title: Executable Mode
executable.description: Use built-in executable, docker or a custom executable. Docker image `odv` needs to be installed for docker.

docker-cleanup.title: Remove Docker Containers After Exection
docker-cleanup.description: Remove Docker containers after they finished executing.

custom.title: Custom ODV CLI
custom.description: Not used unless executable mode is set to *custom*. Path to your OpenDiabetesVault command line interface executable.

precompile.title: Filter Compilation
precompile.description: If enabled filter processes will be compiled, using the compile command below, before being passed to the CLI.

executable.title: Executable Mode
executable.description: Use built-in executable, docker or a custom executable. Docker image `plotteria` needs to be installed for docker.

docker-cleanup.title: Remove Docker Containers After Exection
docker-cleanup.description: Remove Docker containers after they finished executing.

custom.title: Custom Plot Generator
custom.description: Not used unless executable mode is set to *custom*. Path to your plot executable.

cache-maxsize.title: Plot Cache maximum size
cache-maxsize.description: Plots are cached for display. This value determines how many plots can be cached at once.

cache-preload.title: Plot Cache preload
cache-preload.description: The application always caches the plots currently displayed. This value determines how many plots before and after that will be loaded in advance.

paths.title: System Paths
paths.description: Paths to your Java and Python binaries

java.title: Java
java.description: If java is in your path, you can leave this at default

javac.title: Java Compiler
javac.description: If javac is in your path, you can leave this at default

python.title: Python 3
python.description: If python is in your path, you can leave this at default

commands.title: Commands
commands.description:
Commands are executed in Docker if enabled, or on your system.
The variables `java`, `javac` and `python` will be substituted with the corresponding paths defined above.
The variable `cli` will be substituted with the corresponding path to the ODV CLI executable.
The variables `plot` and `config` will be substituted with the corresponding paths to the plot generator and plot config.

version.title: CLI version
version.description: Used to check the version of your command line interface.

init.title: ODV repository init
init.description: Used to initialize an ODV repository.

status.title: ODV repository status
status.description: Used to load the repository status.

listtags.title: ODV tag list
listtags.description: Used to get all tags of the current ODV repository.

import.title: ODV data import
import.description:
Used to import data into your ODV repository.
**Arguments:**
`type`: import type
`files`: files to import

importslice.title: ODV slice import
importslice.description:
Used to create a tag from slice file.
**Arguments:**
`file`: slice file to import
`tag`: tag to use

export.title: ODV data export
export.description:
Used to export all data from your ODV repository.
**Arguments:**
`type`: import type

exporttagged.title: ODV data export (tagged)
exporttagged.description:
Used to export data with the given tag from your ODV repository.
**Arguments:**
`type`: import type
`tag`: input tag

compile.title: ODV filter compilation
compile.description:
Used to compile ODV filter classes before execution
**Arguments:**
`file`: relative path to process container

process.title: ODV filter process
process.description:
Used to execute filters.
**Arguments:**
`file`: relative path to process container
`out`: tag used for results

processtagged.title: ODV filter process
processtagged.description:
Used to execute filters.
**Arguments:**
`file`: relative path to process container
`in`: tag used for input
`out`: tag used for results

plotversion.title: Plot version
plotversion.description:
Used to check the version of the plot executable.
**Arguments:**
`plot`: path to your plot executable

plot-daily.title: Plot generation (Daily Plots)
plot-daily.description:
Used to generate plots from data.
**Arguments:**
`file`: path to the data file
`out`: path to output directory

plot-tiny.title: Plot generation (Tiny Slices)
plot-tiny.description:
Used to generate plots from data.
**Arguments:**
`file`: path to the data file
`slice`: path to the slice file
`out`: path to output directory

plot-normal.title: Plot generation (Normal Slices)
plot-normal.description:
Used to generate plots from data.
**Arguments:**
`file`: path to the data file
`slice`: path to the slice file
`out`: path to output directory

plot-big.title: Plot generation (Big Slices)
plot-big.description:
Used to generate plots from data.
**Arguments:**
`file`: path to the data file
`slice`: path to the slice file
`out`: path to output directory
